T02D2667:172a-1: a'arya manydzu shr'i gu hya tantra sya manda la bi dhi:/
T02D2667:172a-3: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga //
T02D2667:172a-6: khro bo yi ni bsnyen pa dag / sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas ni //
T02D2667:172a-7: de yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
T02D2667:172a-9: dngos grub dam pa sbyin mdzad pa //
T02D2667:172a-11: yi dgas dmar po zhes bya yi //
T02D2667:172b-0: sngags pas @172b thog ma nyid du ni //
T02D2667:172b-1: de yi gnas ni brtag par bya //
T02D2667:172b-2: shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang //
T02D2667:172b-3: khyim stong dang ni bzhi mdo dang //
T02D2667:172b-5: thibs po lam srang gnyis pa dang //
T02D2667:172b-6: skyed mos tshal dang ri yi rtse //
T02D2667:172b-7: chu yi 'gram mam nags tshal dang //
T02D2667:172b-8: lha chen gyi ni gnas kyang rung //
T02D2667:172b-9: ba lang lhas sam yul gyis //
T02D2667:172b-10: khyad par du ni yul gtsang sar //
T02D2667:172b-11: yang ni yid ni rab 'jug pa //
T02D2667:172b-12: der ni dkyil 'khor rab tu bya //
T02D2667:172b-13: shar dang byang ni dma' ba'am //
T02D2667:172b-14: kha dog snum par rab tu bzang //
T02D2667:172b-15: ba tshva med cing ma gas pa //
T02D2667:172b-16: dang por mkhas pas brtag par bya //
T02D2667:172b-17: dag pa'i gzugs ni rab bzung ste //
T02D2667:172b-18: de nyid gsum brjod sa la ni //
T02D2667:172b-19: lag gis brdab pa dag tu bya //
T02D2667:172b-20: rab 'gyur lha mo sbran par bya //
T02D2667:172b-21: skyob ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2667:172b-22: spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyi //
T02D2667:172b-23: sa dang pha rol phyin pa la //
T02D2667:172b-24: lha mo khyod ni dpang du gyur //
T02D2667:172b-25: sh'akya seng ge skyob pa yis //
T02D2667:172b-26: ji ltar bdud kyi tshogs bcom pa //
T02D2667:172b-27: de bzhin bdag gis bdud las ni //
T02D2667:172b-28: rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri //
T02D2667:172b-29: gser gyi mdog dang ldan pa yi //
T02D2667:172b-30: sa yi lha mo ji bzhin du //
T02D2667:172b-31: sa las rab tu 'thon pa ni //
T02D2667:172b-32: rkang bkru mchod yon mnyes par byas //
T02D2667:172b-33: sngon gyi dus na de bzhin gshegs //
T02D2667:172b-35: snge dang bcas pa'i bdud btul nas //
T02D2667:172b-36: chos rnams mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas bzhin //
T02D2667:172b-37: de nas rig 'dzin can gyis ni //
T02D2667:172b-38: sems can don du dkyil 'khor byed //
T02D2667:172b-39: sa yi lha mos dbang mdzod cig / bdud rnams zhi bar mdzad du gsol //
T02D2667:172b-41: de nas rig 'dzin nan gyis ni /
T02D2667:172b-42: sa ni yang dag sbyang bar bya //
T02D2667:172b-43: khro bo yi ni nga rgyal gyis //
T02D2667:172b-44: 'byung bo'i gtor ma byin nas kyang //
T02D2667:172b-45: nga ni rdo rje 'di ming ste //
T02D2667:172b-46: slob ma dag dang sems can gyi //
T02D2667:172b-47: don du dkyil 'khor chen po ni //
T02D2667:172b-48: yi dags phal chen zhes bya bzhengs //
T02D2667:172b-49: gang dag sa 'dir gnas pa yi //
T02D2667:172b-50: lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang //
T02D2667:172b-51: nam mkha' lding dang sha za'i tshogs //
T02D2667:172b-52: 'byung po mang po thams cad kun //
T02D2667:172b-53: mchod sbyin bden pa 'di long la //
T02D2667:172b-54: 'di ru ma gnas gzhan du deng //
T02D2667:172b-55: khro bo 'bar ba'i bka' byung gis //
T02D2667:172b-56: skad cig gis ni myur du deng //
T02D2667:173a-2: khro bo chen po'i bka' gcog pa //
T02D2667:173a-3: myur du 'gro bar mi sems ni //
T02D2667:173a-4: spyi bo tshal ba brgyar 'gas so //
T02D2667:173a-5: aom aa kro te ka ya m'a nta ka ha na ma tha bhanydza h'um phat /
T02D2667:173a-6: bgegs kyi phyogs nas brjod nas kyang //
T02D2667:173a-7: khro bo 'bar ba'i bzhin gyis ni //
T02D2667:173a-8: rkad mthil h'um las rdo rje mchog /'bar bas bgegs ni bskrad par bya //
T02D2667:173a-9: sa la sngags chu gtor nas kyang //
T02D2667:173a-10: sa yi dbus su khru gang brko //
T02D2667:173a-11: sol ba la sogs ro dag ni //
T02D2667:173a-12: bsal nas sngags kyi chu yis gtor //
T02D2667:173a-13: rin chen lnga stsogs gang ba yi //
T02D2667:173a-14: bum pa'i nang du bcug nas kyang //
T02D2667:173a-15: rang gis kyang ni dgang bar bya //
T02D2667:173a-16: dri yi chu yis gtor bar bya //
T02D2667:173a-17: ba yi lnga dang ldan pa yi //
T02D2667:173a-18: lci bas kyang ni byug par bya //
T02D2667:173a-20: kun du sbyo rab brtsam par bya'o //
T02D2667:173a-22: de nas mkhas pas sta gon gyi //
T02D2667:173a-23: las ni gnyis pa rab tu brtsam //
T02D2667:173a-24: lnga yi rdzas la sbyar ba yi //
T02D2667:173a-25: dri yi chus ni dkyil 'khor bya //
T02D2667:173a-26: de nas tsandan dmar pos kyang //
T02D2667:173a-27: padma dag gi gzugs su bya //
T02D2667:173a-28: yi dags 'dzin pa'i sngags dag gis //
T02D2667:173a-29: me tog dmar po dbu sa stsogs bzhag / de nas mchod yon gzhag par bya //
T02D2667:173a-30: me tog sdu gu dri zhim dang //
T02D2667:173a-31: aa ga ru dang sbyar ba yi //
T02D2667:173a-32: gu gul bdug pa'ang de bzhin no //
T02D2667:173a-33: mar me mar gyi mar me mchog / dri yi
T02D2667:173a-34: don du tsanda mchog / tsanda na dkar po dmar
T02D2667:173a-35: po yi // gtor ma nya dang sha la sogs //
T02D2667:173a-36: sbyar thug la sogs de bzhin no //
T02D2667:173a-37: me tog chur bcas aarka dang //
T02D2667:173a-38: ras la stsogs pa thams cad do //
T02D2667:173a-39: de ltar de ni tshogs bsags nas //
T02D2667:173a-40: slob dpon gyis ni khrus byas nas //
T02D2667:173a-41: smyung ba byas te mnyam gzhag pas //
T02D2667:173a-42: khro bo'i bsrung bas byin gyis brlab //
T02D2667:173a-43: 'di ltar rtog pa zhib mo las //
T02D2667:173a-44: gsungs pa'i rim pas khro bo nyid //
T02D2667:173a-45: bskyed dang sbyan drangs la stsogs kyis //
T02D2667:173a-46: lha de 'bad de mnyes par bya //
T02D2667:173a-47: de nas 'bad de gsol ba gdab //
T02D2667:173a-48: dkon mchog gsum dang rigs gsum gyi //
T02D2667:173a-49: mgon po de bzhin gshegs dang bcas //
T02D2667:173a-50: gang dag rigs kyi khro bo'i tshogs //
T02D2667:173a-51: ma lus bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02D2667:173a-52: slob ma la ni phan pa dang //
T02D2667:173b-0: khro bo khyod la mchod pa'i @173b phyir //
T02D2667:173b-1: bdag ni nang par dkyil 'khor bgyid //
T02D2667:173b-2: byin gyis brlab cing gnang mdzad cing //
T02D2667:173b-3: thugs rjes rjes su gzung du gsol //
T02D2667:173b-6: gser sogs rin chen las byung ba'i //
T02D2667:173b-7: bum pa bzang po ma nyams pa'i //
T02D2667:173b-8: khrus kyes gtsang mar byas pa yi //
T02D2667:173b-9: dri yi chus kyang byug par bya //
T02D2667:173b-10: mtshan nyid ldan pa'i bum pa gnyis //
T02D2667:173b-11: padma'i steng du be con dang //
T02D2667:173b-12: las kyi rgya gram bri bar bya //
T02D2667:173b-13: gtsang ma'i gos kyis mgul ba dkri //
T02D2667:173b-14: dang po 'od gsal rgyu las ni //
T02D2667:173b-15: kha dog dkar po bam las byung //
T02D2667:173b-16: ji bzhin dbyibs su bskyid nas su //
T02D2667:173b-17: de yi nang du padma bsam //
T02D2667:173b-18: padma'i lte bar nyi ma la //
T02D2667:173b-19: h'um las byung ba'i khro bo bskyed //
T02D2667:173b-20: khro bo gnyis po de dag ni //
T02D2667:173b-21: rang mtshan kha dog ldan par bya //
T02D2667:173b-22: sbyan drangs nas ni rab bcug nas //
T02D2667:173b-23: mchod yon la sogs de la dbul //
T02D2667:173b-24: so so'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad //
T02D2667:173b-25: bzlas nas chu yi rang bzhin du //
T02D2667:173b-26: khro bo gnyis ka gyur par bsam //
T02D2667:173b-27: rin chen sman la stsogs pa dang //
T02D2667:173b-28: dpag bsam shing stsogs kha rgyan byas //
T02D2667:173b-29: bum pa gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D2667:173b-30: slob ma gnas pa'i cho ga dag / gzhan du rtog pa zhib las bshad //
T02D2667:173b-31: de bas 'dir ni de bzhin no //
T02D2667:173b-32: sbyi yi las kyis gnas par bya //
T02D2667:173b-33: 'on kyang rang gis cho ga dag / cung zad 'di dag sbyar bar bya //
T02D2667:173b-34: slob ma smyung bar byas nas kyang //
T02D2667:173b-35: khrus kyi cho ga legs byas te //
T02D2667:173b-36: khro bos bsrung ba byin brlabs nas //
T02D2667:173b-37: bla ma la ni gsol ba gdag / dpa' bo
T02D2667:173b-38: chen po deng gson cig / bdag ni 'khor bas
T02D2667:173b-39: skyo ba dang // sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D2667:173b-40: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba gsol //
T02D2667:173b-41: dkyil 'khor lha la de bzhin no //
T02D2667:173b-42: khyad par du ni slob dpon la'o //
T02D2667:173b-43: byang chub sems kyang bdag la gsol //
T02D2667:173b-44: sngags kyi sbyod dang brtul zhugs gang //
T02D2667:173b-45: nge bzhin bdag ni bsgrub par 'tshal //
T02D2667:173b-47: blo chen gyis ni bskyab du gsol //
T02D2667:173b-48: slob ma'i tshig gsan bla ma bzang //
T02D2667:173b-49: brtse bas bu la mngon phyogs nas //
T02D2667:173b-50: dang ba'i bzhing yis 'di skad smra //
T02D2667:173b-51: bu gcig 'dir shog theg chen gyi //
T02D2667:173b-52: khyod ni tshul chen snod gyur te //
T02D2667:173b-53: rig pa 'dzin pa spyod ba'i tshul //
T02D2667:173b-54: khyod la yang ni bshad par bya //
T02D2667:174a-2: sems can phan phyir gang bzhugs pa //
T02D2667:174a-3: kun gyis thabs chen sngags kyi ni //
T02D2667:174a-4: cho ga mkhyen nas thams cad mkhyen //
T02D2667:174a-5: de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir //
T02D2667:174a-6: gsang sngags spyod pa mnyam med pa //
T02D2667:174a-7: bdud kyi tshogs rnams 'dul byed pa//
T02D2667:174a-8: khyod kyis blo gros 'di gyis shig / de skad spro ba bskyed nas su //
T02D2667:174a-9: slob mas phyag 'tshal la sogs pa //
T02D2667:174a-10: yan lag bdun pa'i smon lam bya'o //
T02D2667:174a-11: de nas slob dpon gyis sngom pa dpog ste /
T02D2667:174a-12: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la //
T02D2667:174a-13: khyod kyis skyabs su 'gro bar gyis //
T02D2667:174a-14: dkyil 'khor lha dang slob dpon dag / khyod kyis rtag tu gzung bar bya //
T02D2667:174a-15: sems can thams cad sgrol byed pa'i //
T02D2667:174a-16: byang chub sems ni mnyam med pa //
T02D2667:174a-17: yang dag brtan por gzung bar bya //
T02D2667:174a-18: rig pa 'dzin pa'i sdom pa gzung //
T02D2667:174a-19: srog chags gsod dang ma byin len /
T02D2667:174a-21: nyes pa kun gyi rtsa ba yi //
T02D2667:174a-22: chad ni btung ba spang bar bya //
T02D2667:174a-23: lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang //
T02D2667:174a-24: ngag gi nyes pa rnams bzhi dang //
T02D2667:174a-25: yid kyi rnam gsum bsrung bar bya //
T02D2667:174a-26: sems can 'tshe ba ma lus spang //
T02D2667:174a-27: sems can don la mngon dga' zhing //
T02D2667:174a-28: theg pa chen po'i lam la gnas //
T02D2667:174a-29: dam pa nye bar mnyes pa dang //
T02D2667:174a-30: 'dul ba'i don ni ma lus bya //
T02D2667:174a-31: lha dang lha min gsang ba pa //
T02D2667:174a-32: de la brnyas par mi bya'o //
T02D2667:174a-33: phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha rnams //
T02D2667:174a-35: spyod dang brtul zhugs gsang ba gang //
T02D2667:174a-36: gsang ba brtul zhugs brtan por gyis //
T02D2667:174a-37: slob ma brtan po rab dang bas //
T02D2667:174a-38: ji skad gsungs pa'i sdom pa kun //
T02D2667:174a-39: 'khor bas skyo ba'i yid bzhag nas //
T02D2667:174a-40: nges par legs pa'i don du gzung //
T02D2667:174a-41: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi //
T02D2667:174a-42: sdig pa mang po kun nas bshags //
T02D2667:174a-43: dge pa kun la yi rang ngo //
T02D2667:174a-44: sangs rgyas byang chub gzung bar gyis //
T02D2667:174a-45: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02D2667:174a-46: byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i //
T02D2667:174a-47: mnyam med byang chub sems ni bskyed //
T02D2667:174a-48: sems can ma lus don gyi phyir //
T02D2667:174a-49: bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung //
T02D2667:174a-50: sems can ma bsgral dpag med pa //
T02D2667:174b-0: mya ngan @174b 'das la dgod par bya //
T02D2667:174b-1: lus ngag yid kyi nyes rnams bsdams //
T02D2667:174b-2: bag med chang rnams btung ba yang //
T02D2667:174b-3: theg pa dman la 'dad mi bgyi //
T02D2667:174b-4: lha dang lha min gsang ba pa //
T02D2667:174b-5: bla ma brnyas par mi bya'o //
T02D2667:174b-6: phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang //
T02D2667:174b-7: mtshan ma la sogs mi 'gom mo //
T02D2667:174b-8: rig pa 'dzin pa'i sdom pa kun //
T02D2667:174b-9: tshul chen sngags pas gsungs pa kun //
T02D2667:174b-10: kun nas kun du gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2667:174b-11: las dang bka' stsal ma lus bgyi //
T02D2667:174b-12: spyi gtsug la sogs gnas rnams su //
T02D2667:174b-13: khro bo'i sngags rnams gzhag par bya //
T02D2667:174b-14: so shing srung skud de bzhin sbyin //
T02D2667:174b-15: ku sha'i stan la cho ga bzhin //
T02D2667:174b-16: slob ma gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D2667:174b-17: ji ltar rim par dkyil 'khor la //
T02D2667:174b-18: mchod yon la sogs phul nas kyang //
T02D2667:174b-19: yid kyis nam mkhar bzhugs nas ni //
T02D2667:174b-20: nad par mkhas pas thig gsab bo //
T02D2667:174b-21: dkar po dmar po sdon po yi //
T02D2667:174b-22: kha dog gsum pa'i skud ba ni //
T02D2667:174b-23: ras bal la sogs btsos pas bya //
T02D2667:174b-24: stong pa rgyu las yi ge gsum //
T02D2667:174b-25: so so'i cha ru bskyed nas kyang //
T02D2667:174b-26: sku gsung thugs dag bsam par bya //
T02D2667:174b-27: nam mkhar gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs //
T02D2667:174b-28: ye shes thig skud bkug ste gzhug / dri yi phyogs la sogs pas mchod //
T02D2667:174b-29: gnyis su med pa'i sngags kyis ni //
T02D2667:174b-30: thig skud sum sgril mdzes pa yis //
T02D2667:174b-31: mkhas pas thig btab phun sum tshogs //
T02D2667:174b-32: shar gyi sgo ru gnas nas kyang //
T02D2667:174b-33: khro bo'i skur ni rang byas nas //
T02D2667:174b-34: sngags kyi yi ge dgod par bya //
T02D2667:174b-35: g-yon gyi khu tshur lte bar bsten //
T02D2667:174b-36: las kyi khro bor bsams nas su //
T02D2667:174b-37: thog mar shar nas nub du'o //
T02D2667:174b-38: de 'og lho nas byang du ste //
T02D2667:174b-39: nam mkhar thig gnyis gdab par bya //
T02D2667:174b-40: phyogs bcu na bzhugs de bzhin gshegs //
T02D2667:174b-41: 'gro don dus la bab par bskul //
T02D2667:174b-42: de nas yang ni de bzhin te //
T02D2667:174b-43: thig skud de ni phyogs mtshams nas //
T02D2667:174b-44: shar lho yi ni mtshams nas kyang //
T02D2667:174b-45: nub nas byang gi mtshams dag tu //
T02D2667:174b-46: thig gis rab tu tshad byas te //
T02D2667:174b-47: gru bzhi par ni thig gdab bo //
T02D2667:174b-48: rim pa gcig pa mdzes pa la //
T02D2667:174b-49: sgo bzhi dag gis mdzes par bya //
T02D2667:174b-51: dbus su padmo bri bar bya //
T02D2667:174b-52: padmo dang ni phyogs bzhi'i sgo //
T02D2667:175a-2: snying po mdzes pa'ang de bzhin te //
T02D2667:175a-3: thams cad cho ga bzhin du gdag / cho ga bzhin du dkyil 'khor de //
T02D2667:175a-4: kun du thig gis btab nas kyang //
T02D2667:175a-5: mchod yon bzhengs te rab tu gshegs //
T02D2667:175a-6: yi ge gsum dang mu: yis 'grol //
T02D2667:175a-7: aom a'a: h'um mu: ngur khrod rdzas kyi thal bas ni //
T02D2667:175a-8: phyi nas kun du bri bar bya //
T02D2667:175a-9: yi dgas phal chen gsang mchog ni //
T02D2667:175a-10: dkyil 'khor mkhas pas nub mo bri //
T02D2667:175a-11: khru gang la sogs rim pa nas //
T02D2667:175a-12: khru ni brgyad pa'i bar du ste //
T02D2667:175a-13: de las lhag pa yong mi bri //
T02D2667:175a-14: las kyi rim pa so sor bri //
T02D2667:175a-15: dur khrod thal bas sbyar ba'i tshon //
T02D2667:175a-16: kha dog gsum ni bcos par byas //
T02D2667:175a-17: stong pa nyid kyi rgyu las te //
T02D2667:175a-18: kha dog gsum ni yi ges bskyed //
T02D2667:175a-19: ye shes tshon dag bkug nas kyang //
T02D2667:175a-20: gnyis med byas la mchod yon dbul //
T02D2667:175a-21: khro bo'i yi ge dag bzlas la //
T02D2667:175a-22: rim pa bzhin du bri bar bya //
T02D2667:175a-23: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis //
T02D2667:175a-24: sems can khams ni sgrol bar byed //
T02D2667:175a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis //
T02D2667:175a-26: gshin rje gshed ni mchog gi gnas //
T02D2667:175a-27: dbang ldan phyogs su kha dog gsum //
T02D2667:175a-28: ji bzhin legs par bris nas kyang //
T02D2667:175a-29: khro bo'i sngags kyis brtag par bya //
T02D2667:175a-30: nyas pa kun las rnam grol ba'i //
T02D2667:175a-31: tshon gyi las ni de nas brtsam //
T02D2667:175a-32: dbus su legs par gzhag nas kyang //
T02D2667:175a-33: khro bos kyang ni byin gyis brlab //
T02D2667:175a-34: de nyid gsum gyi gsang sngags bzlas //
T02D2667:175a-35: de bzhin thig las gsum bri ste //
T02D2667:175a-36: dbus kyi padmo gser gyi mdog /'dab mdag ni dmar pos brgyan //
T02D2667:175a-37: snying po ze ba mdzes pa de //
T02D2667:175a-38: gser gyi kha dog bzhin du bya //
T02D2667:175a-39: thams cad dur khrod thal bas bskor //
T02D2667:175a-40: sgo dang phyogs mtshams la sogs pa //
T02D2667:175a-41: rigs ni dbye bas phye bar bri //
T02D2667:175a-42: rta babs me yi phreng ba'i mthar //
T02D2667:175a-43: thams cad rigs kyi kha dog bya //
T02D2667:175a-44: lho phyogs kyi ni sgo phye la //
T02D2667:175a-45: lhag ma rnams ni bcad par bri //
T02D2667:175a-46: gzhan yang yi dgas lhag pa yi //
T02D2667:175a-47: padmo'i lte bar bri bar bya //
T02D2667:175a-48: de bzhin phyogs sgo nang dag dang //
T02D2667:175a-49: phyogs rnams de dag thams cad du //
T02D2667:175a-50: yi dgags bzhi dang mgo med do //
T02D2667:175a-51: dur khrod thal bas spags te bri //
T02D2667:175b-0: byang shar la @175b sogs grva rnams su //
T02D2667:175b-1: mkhas pas ce con phyag rgya bri //
T02D2667:175b-2: gal te bri bar mi nus na //
T02D2667:175b-3: yi dgas phal chen dbus dag tu //
T02D2667:175b-4: padma lnga bris gang yin pa'o //
T02D2667:175b-5: de yi steng du yi dgas ni //
T02D2667:175b-6: yi dags kyi ni sngags mchog gis //
T02D2667:175b-7: bsam pa dag ni byas kyang rung //
T02D2667:175b-8: grva yi dbyug pa bzhi po yang /
T02D2667:175b-9: sngags nyid kyis ni bsam par bya //
T02D2667:175b-10: de bzhin sngags kyis thams cad bya'o //
T02D2667:175b-11: gal te dri bar nus kyang ni //
T02D2667:175b-12: sngags nyid steng du gzhag par bya //
T02D2667:175b-13: sgo yi yi dags bzhi po yang //
T02D2667:175b-14: sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par gsungs //
T02D2667:175b-16: dkyil 'khor rdzogs par shes nas ni //
T02D2667:175b-17: rnam rgyal khro bo'i bum pa ni //
T02D2667:175b-18: lho yi sgo yi dbus su gzhag / las kyi bum pa byang shar te //
T02D2667:175b-19: bgegs srungs zhes ni brjod la gzhag / mar me mar gyi rgyu las te //
T02D2667:175b-20: snying po 'jam pa brgyad kyis bskong //
T02D2667:175b-21: lha ba shos dag kyang de yi grangs //
T02D2667:175b-22: bdug pa mchog dang aa ga ru //
T02D2667:175b-23: de yi grangs su mnyam par gzhag //
T02D2667:175b-24: tsandan dkar dmar de bzhin blang //
T02D2667:175b-25: mchod pa'i khyad par gzhan yang ste //
T02D2667:175b-26: thams cad cho ga bzhin du gzhag / nya dang sha dang zan dron tshogs //
T02D2667:175b-27: khyad par gtor ma dag kyang gzhag / yi dags phal chen phyi rol du //
T02D2667:175b-28: chu dang bcas pa'i me tog gzhag /
T02D2667:175b-29: ji ltar cho ga zhib mo bzhin //
T02D2667:175b-30: phun sum tshogs pa'i yo byad gzhag / gnas dang gnas su de bzhin brgyan //
T02D2667:175b-31: de 'og slob dpon bdag nyid kyis //
T02D2667:175b-32: khrus kyi cho ga byas nas kyang //
T02D2667:175b-33: rang gi snying po sngags kyis ni //
T02D2667:175b-34: thams cad yan lag sngags kyis bya //
T02D2667:175b-35: smyung bas byang chub sems ldan pas //
T02D2667:175b-36: ji ltar rim pas bskyed nas kyang //
T02D2667:175b-37: mjug tu khro bo gshin rje gshed //
T02D2667:175b-38: sngags brjod pas ni sbyan drangs nas //
T02D2667:175b-39: rang gi snying po sa bzhugs su gsol //
T02D2667:175b-40: yi dgas kyi ni spyi bor yang //
T02D2667:175b-41: me tog dmar po bzhag par bya //
T02D2667:175b-42: blo ldan gyis ni khro bo la'o //
T02D2667:175b-43: de nas tsandan dmar bo dbul //
T02D2667:175b-44: tsandan gyis ni gtor ba yi //
T02D2667:175b-45: me tog sngags kyis dbul bar bya //
T02D2667:175b-46: de nas gtso bo'i snying pos dbul //
T02D2667:175b-47: 'byung ba'i gtor ma khro bo la //
T02D2667:175b-48: phul nas yi dags phal chen gyi //
T02D2667:175b-49: phyi rol du ni mkhas pa yis //
T02D2667:175b-50: sme gtor rnams kyang dbul bar bya //
T02D2667:175b-51: de nas gtso bo'i snying po nyid //
T02D2667:176a-0: @176a * // brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya //
T02D2667:176a-1: khro bo'i gtso la phyogs nas ni //
T02D2667:176a-2: de nas yang ni bdug pa 'bul //
T02D2667:176a-3: cho gas khrus byas smyung ba yi //
T02D2667:176a-4: slob ma dag gi bsod nams kyang //
T02D2667:176a-5: sngags kun gyis ni gzi byin bskyed //
T02D2667:176a-6: khro bo yi ni snying po yi //
T02D2667:176a-7: lag gnyis me tog byin nas ni //
T02D2667:176a-8: gos kyis gdong ni g-yogs par bya //
T02D2667:176a-9: khro bo'i sngags kyis sgo drung gzhag //
T02D2667:176a-10: bla ma rdo rje 'chang gis kyang //
T02D2667:176a-11: mtshog ma spyi gtsug la sogs la //
T02D2667:176a-12: sngags rnams ma lus gzhag par bya //
T02D2667:176a-13: bsang gtor sngon 'gro de bzhin te //
T02D2667:176a-14: rin chen gser stsogs yon mchog dag /'bad pas bla ma la phul nas //
T02D2667:176a-15: 'jug pa'i sngon du gsol ba gdab //
T02D2667:176a-16: 'di ni dngos grub thob pa'i rgyu //
T02D2667:176a-17: sangs rgyas kun gyis rab sbrul pa'i //
T02D2667:176a-18: bla ma la ni phyag 'tshal te //
T02D2667:176a-19: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02D2667:176a-21: 'jam dpal khro bo mi bzad pa //
T02D2667:176a-22: de yi dkyil 'khor dam pa mchog / yi dgas mang po zhes bya'i phyir //
T02D2667:176a-23: bdag gis slob ma gzhug bar bgyi //
T02D2667:176a-24: aom a'a: h'um zhes pas bskul bar bya'o //
T02D2667:176a-25: de nas slob ma bdag nyid dngos grub kyi snod du bya ba'i phyir na 'di dag bya ste //
T02D2667:176a-26: bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas dang //
T02D2667:176a-27: chos dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs //
T02D2667:176a-28: 'gro ba ma lus pa yi skyabs //
T02D2667:176a-29: bdag ni gsum la skyabs su mchi //
T02D2667:176a-30: de nas skyabs ni gsum po dang //
T02D2667:176a-31: dkyil na gshin rje gshed gcig pu //
T02D2667:176a-32: dpa' bo khro bo mi bzad pa //
T02D2667:176a-33: de dag kun la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2667:176a-34: dkon mchog gsum dang khro bo ni //
T02D2667:176a-35: rtag tu bdag ni mchod par bgyid //
T02D2667:176a-36: bla ma la yang de bzhin du //
T02D2667:176a-37: sgo gsum dang ba'i sems kyis mchod //
T02D2667:176a-38: dkyil 'khor la me tog gtor ro //
T02D2667:176a-39: lus kyi nyes pa gsum rnams dang //
T02D2667:176a-40: dag gi bzhi po nyes pa spyad //
T02D2667:176a-41: yid kyi nyes spyad gsum po ste //
T02D2667:176a-42: lus kyi sgrib pa ma lus bshags //
T02D2667:176a-43: sangs rgyas sras bcas 'phags pa yi //
T02D2667:176a-44: thar par byas pa'i dge ba dang //
T02D2667:176a-45: thams cad thar bar gyur pa yi //
T02D2667:176a-46: bdag gzhan dge la yi rang ngo //
T02D2667:176a-47: sa bon mchog las rang byung ba'i //
T02D2667:176a-48: thar par gyur pa'i dge ba'i tshogs //
T02D2667:176b-0: @176b byang chub chen por yongs su bsngo //
T02D2667:176b-1: phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams dag par ni //
T02D2667:176b-2: sems can phan phyir gang bzhugs rnams //
T02D2667:176b-3: thabs kyis mya ngan 'da' bzhed ba //
T02D2667:176b-4: mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs su gsol //
T02D2667:176b-5: ma smin pa rnams smin pa dang //
T02D2667:176b-6: smin pa grol bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2667:176b-7: dam chos bdud rtsi 'byung ba yi//
T02D2667:176b-8: gsung ni du mar bsgrag par mdzod //
T02D2667:176b-9: de nas slob dpon gyis sngar gyi sdom pa thams cad brjod de sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2667:176b-10: slob mas khas blangs pa brjod pas //
T02D2667:176b-11: sdom pa ma lus gzung bar bya //
T02D2667:176b-12: de ring phan chad bu khyod ni //
T02D2667:176b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su zhugs //
T02D2667:176b-14: nga yi ye shes chen po sbyin//
T02D2667:176b-15: de yis dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur //
T02D2667:176b-16: gang dag dkyil 'khor ma zhugs la //
T02D2667:176b-17: gsang ba 'di ni smra ba min //
T02D2667:176b-18: bag med sems kyis smas gyur na //
T02D2667:176b-19: dngos grub cung zab thob mi 'gyur //
T02D2667:176b-20: de nas dam tshig chu blud de //
T02D2667:176b-21: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02D2667:176b-22: dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
T02D2667:176b-23: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub 'thob //
T02D2667:176b-24: 'thung cig rdo rje'i dam tshig yin //
T02D2667:176b-25: dri dang me tog ldan pa'i chus //
T02D2667:176b-26: lag pa g-yas pas blud par byas //
T02D2667:176b-28: dus 'di nyid nas bu khyod kyi //
T02D2667:176b-29: de bzhin gshegs pa nga yin gyis //
T02D2667:176b-30: nga yis ji ltar bka' stsal mchog / mnyan dang bsgrub pa dag kyang gyis //
T02D2667:176b-31: khyod ni nam yang la nga la ni //
T02D2667:176b-32: ma dad pa yi sems rnams spang //
T02D2667:176b-33: slob ma mos pa med pa yis //
T02D2667:176b-34: dngos grub ring bar rgyal bas gsungs //
T02D2667:176b-35: ji ltar dngos grub thob mi thob //
T02D2667:176b-36: rgyud las 'byung bzhin phra rnams brtag / las kyi bya ba rab 'jug pa //
T02D2667:176b-38: slob ma mtshan ldan nyes skyon meng //
T02D2667:176b-39: shin tu bkrus te rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02D2667:176b-40: ba yi rnam lnga blud nas ni //
T02D2667:176b-41: de 'og smyung bar gang gnas pa //
T02D2667:176b-42: zhim pa'i dri yis lus la byug / gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan par byas//
T02D2667:176b-43: shar gyi phyogs su kha bltas la //
T02D2667:176b-44: ku sha'i stan la gzhag par bya //
T02D2667:176b-45: de yi lag gnyis snyim pa'i nang //
T02D2667:176b-46: tsandan gtor ma'i me tog sbyin //
T02D2667:176b-47: aa gar nag po'i du bas kyang //
T02D2667:176b-48: de nas myur du sngags brjod de //
T02D2667:176b-49: sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di yis ni //
T02D2667:176b-50: snod la dbab pa'i las bya'o //
T02D2667:177a-0: @177a * // aom aa kro te ka ya m'anta ka ha na
T02D2667:177a-1: ma tha bhanydza h'um ya m'anta ka gri hna aa
T02D2667:177a-3: snod la babs gyur de nas ni //
T02D2667:177a-4: dge dang mi dge dri bar bya //
T02D2667:177a-5: 'byung ba byung ba bden par smra //
T02D2667:177a-6: sems can chen po 'di gyis la //
T02D2667:177a-7: 'di min zhes ni rjod par byed //
T02D2667:177a-8: de nas khro bo mchog de la //
T02D2667:177a-9: me tog ldan pa'i aargha dbul //
T02D2667:177a-10: de nas bde gshegs bstan pa yi //
T02D2667:177a-11: dam tshig kyang ni bstan par bya //
T02D2667:177a-12: snod kyis thos nas de nas su //
T02D2667:177a-13: de btang nas ni sa la 'gyel //
T02D2667:177a-14: rig pa khro bo gshin rje gshed //
T02D2667:177a-15: grub pa de las bzhud par 'gyur //
T02D2667:177a-16: de las slob mas me tog ni //
T02D2667:177a-17: gshin rje gshed la gtor ba ni //
T02D2667:177a-18: rang gi snying pos me tog nyid //
T02D2667:177a-19: dkyil 'khor la ni gtor bar bya //
T02D2667:177a-21: lho phyogs sgo nas de bzhin te //
T02D2667:177a-22: de nas gdong ras bsal nas kyang //
T02D2667:177a-23: dbyug pa'i phyag rgya bstan par bya //
T02D2667:177a-24: de nas dkyil 'khor de bzhin te //
T02D2667:177a-25: de bzhin gshegs pas de ring nyid //
T02D2667:177a-26: khyod ni nan tan mig phye ste //
T02D2667:177a-27: nga yis ji bzhin mig phye bas //
T02D2667:177a-28: mi bzad dkyil 'khor mthong bar gyis //
T02D2667:177a-30: de nas be con gyi phyag rgya bstan par bya ste /
T02D2667:177a-31: dkon mchog gsum gyi dam tshig ni //
T02D2667:177a-32: mngon par bstan pa sngar byas nas //
T02D2667:177a-33: lag pa g-yas pa cho ga bzhin //
T02D2667:177a-34: legs par rab tu bcing bar bya //
T02D2667:177a-35: rig 'dzin dag gis rtag par ni //
T02D2667:177a-36: lag pa'i sor mo thams cad kyis //
T02D2667:177a-37: mthe bong legs par spras nas ni //
T02D2667:177a-38: rab tu bsdams pa bzang pa bcing //
T02D2667:177a-39: cho ga shes pas be con rgya //
T02D2667:177a-40: snying po sngags sam logs shig tu //
T02D2667:177a-41: sngags pa phyag rgya'i sngags gyis bcing //
T02D2667:177a-42: gzhan du yang ni ma yin no //
T02D2667:177a-46: sarbba ta th'a ga ta kro dha bi dza ya /
T02D2667:177a-47: aa gni dzva li ta dzi ha pra ta shr'i ri h'um h'um phat /
T02D2667:177a-48: de ltar be con phyag rgya dang sngags bstan nas
T02D2667:177a-49: dkyil 'khor yang yi dags phreng ba la sogs pa
T02D2667:177a-51: de nas slob dpon bdag nyid kyis //
T02D2667:177a-52: bstan pa'i be con rgya bcings nas //
T02D2667:177a-53: lho phyogs sgo nas slob ma yis //
T02D2667:177a-54: dri sogs mchod pa ma lus dbul //
T02D2667:177a-55: de nas sngags pa dbang bskur la //
T02D2667:177a-56: chu dang me tog bcas pa yi //
T02D2667:177b-0: @177b snying po gdab pa'i bum pa yis //
T02D2667:177b-1: khro bos dbang bskur mchog sbyin no //
T02D2667:177b-2: aom aa kro te ka ya m'anta ka ha na ma tha ba nydza h'um phat /
T02D2667:177b-3: de nas khro bo'i snying po yis //
T02D2667:177b-4: cho ga bzhin du dbang bskur la //
T02D2667:177b-5: bdug pa me tog phreng ldan par //
T02D2667:177b-6: snying po de la sbyin bar bya //
T02D2667:177b-7: aom aa kro te ka ya la sogs //
T02D2667:177b-8: sngags kyi don ni bcu bdun pa //
T02D2667:177b-9: khro bo de nyid kyis gsungs pa //
T02D2667:177b-10: de ring phan chad bu khyod kyis //
T02D2667:177b-11: khro bo dran par bya zhing bzlas //
T02D2667:177b-12: gzhan yang sngags kyi spyod pa'i mchog smyung bar byang chub sems ldan las //
T02D2667:177b-13: skye bo med ba'i nags tshal du //
T02D2667:177b-14: ru ragsha yi phreng thogs shing //
T02D2667:177b-15: lag pa dri yis byugs nas kying //
T02D2667:177b-18: glang po la yang lam mi bzur //
T02D2667:177b-19: rgyal po la yang phyag mi btsal //
T02D2667:177b-20: bgrod dka' ba nas bgrod par byed //
T02D2667:177b-21: khro bo 'ba' zhig sems byed cing //
T02D2667:177b-22: spyod dang brtul zhugs brten par gyis //
T02D2667:177b-23: zhes brtul zhugs sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2667:177b-24: de nas slob ma dbang thob des //
T02D2667:177b-25: gshin rje gshed ni khro bo yi //
T02D2667:177b-26: tshul las bdag ni don yod de //
T02D2667:177b-27: lha khyod kun la bde mdzad ba //
T02D2667:177b-28: khro bo khyod ni bdag gis mnos //
T02D2667:177b-29: mnos zhes khro bo me tog gtor //
T02D2667:177b-30: de nas slob mas phyag byas te //
T02D2667:177b-31: ci nus yon mchog dbul bar bya //
T02D2667:177b-32: sngags pas bra ma mchod byas na //
T02D2667:177b-34: slob ma snying po byin nas ni //
T02D2667:177b-35: phreng ba tsanngan la sogs pas //
T02D2667:177b-36: mchod nas de yi 'og tu ni //
T02D2667:177b-37: phyi rol du na sngar bzhag pa'i //
T02D2667:177b-38: dri chu la sogs bkang ba'i snod //
T02D2667:177b-39: de nas mchod ba phul nas ni //
T02D2667:177b-40: 'jam dbyangs khro bo mi bzad pa //
T02D2667:177b-41: mthu rtsal drag po slar yang gtang //
T02D2667:177b-42: de btang ba yi 'og tu ni //
T02D2667:177b-43: dkyil 'khor du yang mchod yon dbul //
T02D2667:177b-44: rgya cher sa yi dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D2667:177b-45: dngos grub mtshungs med 'dod pa yi //
T02D2667:177b-46: rig sngags 'chang gis de ltar ni //
T02D2667:177b-47: mchod pa de ltar legs par bya //
T02D2667:177b-48: snod ni gsar sogs rin chan du //
T02D2667:177b-49: tshon rtsi legs par bstsa bar byas //
T02D2667:177b-50: gtsang ma'i chu bo la stsogs por //
T02D2667:177b-51: phyi nas kyang ni rnam lngas byug / tshul chen rgyud las gsungs pa yi //
T02D2667:177b-53: chung zad dge ba gang thob 'dis //
T02D2667:178a-1: po'i gnas thob shog /'phags pa 'jam dpal gsang ba'i
T02D2667:178a-2: rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga / slob dpon
